catalog_script_client.name: date validation

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_9ae62e0e2f1ab1100e05235df699b618
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request loaner vehicle">2de722b02f2131100e05235df699b67c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e4efae782f2131100e05235df699b6df</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>date validation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
 if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
 return;
 }
 
 var dateNeeded = g_form.getValue('date_needed');
 var dateToReturn = g_form.getValue('return_date');

 //If date return is before date needed trigger error message
 if (dateToReturn && dateNeeded && dateToReturn < dateNeeded) {
 alert('Date to return should not be before the Date needed');
 g_form.clearValue('return_date');
 return false; // Prevent form submission
 }
 return true; // Allow form submission
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-05 21:54:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9ae62e0e2f1ab1100e05235df699b618</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>date validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory." source="x_919130_loaner_0">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory.">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9ae62e0e2f1ab1100e05235df699b618</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-05 21:59:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
